message.content:
cs.SE, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.CR 

The paper discusses an approach for self-adaptive systems to cope with runtime uncertainty and changing requirements. This involves leveraging machine learning techniques to determine the best operationalization of context based on sensed data at runtime. The paper also evaluates the approach in a simulated environment in the domain of smart vehicles. Based on this, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are software engineering (cs.SE), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC), systems and control (cs.SY), and cryptography and security (cs.CR).
